documents.document: @mb_inthehutt You are a wonderful woman. Your boys have a half sister?

On TV programme: power without self control makes for dangerous situation.

@raushenbush Power gone to his head. Can’t you people stop him. He’s dangerous.

Been watching tennis for 3 hours now. Between making basil pesto, doing crossword and tweeting.

@CnrJoe @64by4 @POTUS @realDonaldTrump Trump is so ugly in every way.

just as well I didn’t stay up to watch mens tennis final. Recorded it.
@quillfeather She would feel at home. Isn’t she French?

Do they need heart surgeons? Stones don't need operations. https://t.co/MO6DgtJJ4S
@CateOwen Hands too big.

@2TAPU @carol_stirling Replete is what they meant.
@2TAPU Seems to me that feeling “elite” could become dangerous.
I felt that the tennis match was somehow staged at times.
So tired. Stayed up and watched Williams sisters in tennis final. Sleep eluded me as I replayed match in my head.

@SusieFergusonNZ @Btripstheworld My daughter with two older brothers always held her own and at three was convinced girls better.
@Jess_McAllen Our library has a free computer bay with several computers. Staff at counter can Easily oversee it.
@Alt_CDC @Btripstheworld We shall just wait for the epidemics to kick in.
Nice for America to have a president who gets things done. Pity they are the wrong things.
@bustedblonde all four? There are five Wairarapa towns.
This building been part of my life for 80 years. Being demolished. #martinborough https://t.co/zvzZKWwkzd
Twitter has been quite miserable today. Hope for lots of good news tomorrow.
@hcirePT Read it again. It does say what I have said.
@hcirePT Hell, have I been dreaming all this time?
@hcirePT I would rather work towards free contraception, and tell women to use it.
@hcirePT Also, I do not believe there should be laws for or against, just good oversight.
@hcirePT No one has the right. As I said, mothers choice. I am allowed a point od view as well you know.
@BeeFaerie I love cucumber too, but fresh without skins. Love gerkins.
@hcirePT it is the middle and upper class types who abort for social reasons in my experience. Poorer people tend to keep their children.
@hcirePT I think you have rudimentary idea of life. Mothers choice.
@tlscadden1 @hcirePT Yes. However that is the choice of the mother
Is that an excuse to kill them? https://t.co/RL66KnTwWS
@hcirePT Some parents kill their children AFTER they are born. I believe in choice, as well as life.
Reason Trump wanted presidency: to advance his own interests. https://t.co/Wwis6gnzQP
@hcirePT Abortion causes deaths . But they don’t count.
@KellyMcCreary @LI_politico And this is why Trump wanted to be president.
Gales. Spits of rain.
@BeeFaerie Even worse, cucumber with skin on.

Letter in DomPost speaks of “toanga”. Well done Tom White of Island Bay.
People who say Obama should go back to Africa is like telling me to go back to Scotland. I was born in Martinborough.
